definition: to control
surname Guan

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: Is there an evidence that black oxide thickness is well controlled?
sentences.chinese: 是否能證明黑化厚度有很好的管控？

sentences.english: The pressure in the swim bladder is regulated by a gas gland.
sentences.chinese: 魚鰾中的壓力由一個氣體腺來管控。

sentences.english: With so much top line growth hitting the books they stop monitoring invoices and expense reports.
sentences.chinese: 因爲收入豐厚，他們也就不再管控支出報告了。

sentences.english: Is the front-to-back registration on layers measured and controlled?
sentences.chinese: 是否測試並管控層間上下對準度？

sentences.english: The Russians asserted their intention to keep control of the airport.
sentences.chinese: 不過俄羅斯方面宣稱他們的意圖是爲了管控機場。

sentences.english: A financial budget and other system modules to achieve procurement budget reasonable control.
sentences.chinese: 結合財務預算等系統模塊，實現採購預算的合理管控。

sentences.english: Chavez last week announced an increase in the regulated prices of corn and sorghum.
sentences.chinese: 上週查韋斯剛剛宣佈提高玉米和高粱的管控價格。

sentences.english: Study on Traffic Flow and its Management - control Based on Seif - organization Theory.
sentences.chinese: 基於自組織理論的交通流及其管控研究。

sentences.english: Are thermal stressed cross-sections performed as an in-process plating control?
sentences.chinese: 製程電鍍管控是否有熱應力切片試驗？

sentences.english: Some employees need high amounts of control and encouragement.
sentences.chinese: 某些下屬需要相當多的管控與鼓勵。

sentences.english: Is there evidence to demonstrate that spindle run-out is well controlled?
sentences.chinese: 是否能證明鑽軸偏移管控良好？

sentences.english: Are the maximum number of re-sharpens documented &controlled?
sentences.chinese: 是否有文件規定並對最大研磨次數進行管控？

sentences.english: Also, inventoried under FIFO with expired date control?
sentences.chinese: 並且，到期管控有先進先出目錄？

sentences.english: Are the customer specific ENIG thickness requirements documented on the traveler?
sentences.chinese: 是否有文件規定按照客人規定的化鎳金厚度進行管控？

sentences.english: Is the lay-up done in a clean room with adequate temperature and humidity control?
sentences.chinese: 疊合線無塵室是否有相應的溫度與溼度管控？

sentences.english: Are cross-sections performed as an in-process plating control?
sentences.chinese: 製程電鍍管控是否有進行切片確認？

definition: to supervise/to manage/to administer/management/administration/CL:個|个[ge4]
to control/to restrict/(PRC law) non-custodial sentence with specified restrictions on one's activities for up to 3 years (e.g. not to participate in demonstrations)
to prevent and control (e.g. the spread of a communicable disease)
practical/workable/to implement/to carry out/to decide
to oversee/to take charge of/to supervise/to administer/supervisory/supervision
to increase (e.g. one's effort)
micromanagement
to govern/to administer/to manage/to control/governance
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to investigate strictly
normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
measure/step/CL:個|个[ge4]
to implement/to carry out/to put into practice
to strike a severe blow/to crack down/to take strong measures
to ensure/to guarantee
to give a more granular level of detail/to elaborate/to refine/to become more differentiated
